wikipedia_page.main: Martin Johnson (born 27 March 1963 in Leatherhead) is a British auto racing driver. He is best known for competing in the British Touring Car Championship with his own team, Boulevard Team Racing.

File:Martin Johnson Vauxhall Astra.jpg|Martin Johnson's BTC-T Vauxhall Astra Coupe as seen during 2009 season.

For 2005 and 2006 the Astra Coupes were used sporadically by several independent drivers; it had little success, being outpaced by the more consistently utilised cars. After two years without an entry, the car returned to the series in 2009,  in the hands of Martin Johnson, who scored 2 points in his first season. The 2010 saw the last entry of the Astra Coupe, again in Johnson's hands, and it achieved a 9th place in its final season at Rockingham. The car still saw action in 2011 in the UAE.
* Martin Johnson: Renault Clio Cup (Boulevard Team Racing) → Boulevard Team Racing
